channel.title: Fix Forum Header Links
channel.description:
in our forum the headers needs a simple quick update:
- [DOWNLOADS] should be kept referring to
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Download
or it should be changed to
https://www.whonix.org/download/
(as in that time we werent having nice homepage design explaining which virtualizer is available and suported as now)?
- [BLOG] rename it to [NEWS] and change the link to https://forums.whonix.org/c/news , OR just remove it as NEWS section already pinned in the forum.
- [Priority Support] Link is referring to [payments](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Payments)? change it to:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Priority_Support
- add new section if you like [DONATE] or [PAYMENTS] with this URL:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Payments

item.title: Fix Forum Header Links
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
TNT_BOM_BOM:

in our forum the headers needs a simple quick update:

  • [DOWNLOADS] should be kept referring to

Whonix

Download

Download Whonix. Privacy Protection. Anonymity Online.

or it should be changed to

https://www.whonix.org/download/

Intentionally two different versions with different complexity.

TNT_BOM_BOM:

[BLOG] rename it to [NEWS] and change the link to https://forums.whonix.org/c/news , OR just remove it as NEWS section already pinned in the forum.

Fixed.

https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=MediaWiki%3ASidebar&type=revision&diff=37154&oldid=26039

Read full topic

item.description:
in our forum the headers needs a simple quick update:

  • [DOWNLOADS] should be kept referring to
Whonix

Download

Download Whonix. Privacy Protection. Anonymity Online.

or it should be changed to

https://www.whonix.org/download/

(as in that time we werent having nice homepage design explaining which virtualizer is available and suported as now)?

  • [BLOG] rename it to [NEWS] and change the link to https://forums.whonix.org/c/news , OR just remove it as NEWS section already pinned in the forum.
